page.title: 08THE POST HILL CENTRE
page.content: The Centre is for the treatment and training of{mentally handicapped } people aged 16 and over. The first of its kind in Britain, it aims to integrate patients back into the community. The Centre admitted its first patients on{28th August, 1984.} 43 people are employed under the Senior Nurse in charge, psychologist and an occupational therapist. The Centre has 3 main buildings. {Esther Molland House}is used for day facilities such as needlework, domestic chores, gardening and the teaching of community skills. {Bryher}is a bungalow for more disturbed patients and{Pine Lodge}is a bungalow for those with physical disabilities. Patients respond well to being fully involved in this Centre. Real progress is being made with them.
